00165 typedef struct {
00166     enum {
00167         UA_JOBTYPE_NOTHING,
00168         UA_JOBTYPE_DETACHCONNECTION,
00169         UA_JOBTYPE_BINARYMESSAGE,
00170         UA_JOBTYPE_METHODCALL,
00171         UA_JOBTYPE_DELAYEDMETHODCALL,
00172     } type;
00173     union {
00174         UA_Connection *closeConnection;
00175         struct {
00176             UA_Connection *connection;
00177             UA_ByteString message;
00178         } binaryMessage;
00179         struct {
00180             void *data;
00181             void (*method)(UA_Server *server, void *data);
00182         } methodCall;
00183     } job;
00184 } UA_Job;
00185
